column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place looks okay from the outside
column2: but the inside is much nicer.  This is my favorite tapas place so far and it really is pretty reasonable.  My favorites are the bacon wrapped dates
column4: cheese with crusty bread....and hell...pretty much everything on the menu.  Great ambiance
column5: good service good drinks and nice patio area.  If you're going to do tapas
